task.title: Add Scene & Source
task.shortdesc: To start recording, a Scene is to be added. There can be multiple scenes (screens) which an agent can change and display while screen recording.

taskbody.context:
This section showcases the steps to capture a screens on Windows operating system.
OBS Studio starts with a blank scene by default. Agents can add all kinds of Sources to the Scenes â€” to show browser, Windows/macOS screen capture, display capture, webcam, etc. Follow the below steps to capture a screen

step.cmd: At the bottom of the main window, click the '+' icon in the Scenes control tab.
Click the '+' icon in the Sources control tab.
step.stepresult:
A list of different sources is displayed.For macOS screen capture source, refer to the link:
https://obsproject.com/kb/macos-screen-capture-sourceThe screen capture functionality is not available on Linux operating system.
